title: Pixel 6’s fingerprint scanner calibration tool is failing for some users
content:
The in-display fingerprint scanner of the Pixel 6 series has been subject to a lot of controversies. Many users have complained about the slow speed and inconsistent performance of the scanner and while Google has tried to address this with software updates, it’s still not on par with other flagship smartphones. Now we’re hearing yet

The post Pixel 6’s fingerprint scanner calibration tool is failing for some users appeared first on xda-developers.
description: According to multiple reports, the Pixel 6's fingerprint scanner calibration tool is falling for many users.
